text: César Isella (20 October 1938 – 28 January 2021) was an Argentinian folk singer-songwriter and guitarist. He played for Los Fronterizos from 1956 to 1966. He also wrote "Canción con todos", which is thought to be the Latin American anthem. He was born in Salta, Argentina. Isella died on 28 January 2021 in Buenos Aires from coronary artery disease, aged 82.Murió César Isella, el gran compositor y cantante argentino de folklore ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Argentine singer-songwriters Category:Argentine guitarists Category:Folk singers Category:Folk musicians
title: César Isella
